title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 3 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 3 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Mayor de Blasio imposes a vaccine passport mandate in NYC. Democrats said all along they would never impose vaccine mandates, now they’re doing it in the nation’s largest city. N.Y. AG finds Governor Andrew Cuomo sexually harassed 11 women. Will Cuomo stay or go? Clay thinks he’ll go, Buck says he’ll stay. Will they take his Emmy away? Cuomo on Kavanaugh: Believe survivors. CNN’s Fredo Cuomo testified to AG that he advised his brother on allegations. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
